title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Product Focus in Residential Design + Build

content.rendered: Residential Design + Build recently featured the Santa Maria Cypress Ridge, Eldorado Stone’s newest color to its collection of nationwide profiles. Inspired by Italian and Provencal architecture, Cypress Ridge is designed to reflect the poetic harmony of age-old hilltop villages.

excerpt.rendered: Residential Design + Build recently featured the Santa Maria Cypress Ridge, Eldorado Stone’s newest color to its collection of nationwide profiles. Inspired by Italian and Provencal architecture, Cypress Ridge is designed to reflect the poetic harmony of age-old hilltop villages.
